ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] windows xp
ygData.msgSnippet: Cool. and one of the things I actually like about XP is that it is smarter at shutting down. If I hit the button on the front of my computer to turn it off, it
ygData.messageBody:
Cool. and one of the things I actually like about XP is that it is smarter
at shutting down. If I hit the button on the front of my computer to turn it
off, it tells itself to shut down XP and shuts it down properly.
Works really well when the power goes out and my freaking stupid backup unit
doesn't keep the monitor on. I used to have a backup that kept the monitor
on but it died. I wish I could find another one like it.
I was playing EQ the other night and a tree fell on my powerlines. :-(
It sucked.
luv,
-Su

I now have windows xp and eq looks even better. I still use a GeForce 4
MX 330 video card but the dirvers for windows xp make it WQHL certified and
it works fine. just thought I would let everyone know.
